name: Ext_R3_Account_active
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.Account.active for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents Account.active from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Account|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Time window that transactions may be posted to this account
element.definition:
Indicates the period of time over which the account is allowed to have transactions posted to it.
This period may be different to the coveragePeriod which is the duration of time that services may occur.
element.comment: Mapping of FHIR R3:Account element `Account.active` to R4:Account element ``
